author: philip
msg: Fix issue 3898, upgrading deletes within copies.
(write_entry): Allocate below_working_node in result pool and store
it in the baton, use it to propagate the multi-layer delete.
(delete_in_copy_upgrade): Mark with issue, remove outdated comment,
